sentences.en: A feed will usually provide instant gratification to a crying baby.
sentences.cn: 喂食通常可使正在哭闹的婴儿立即得到满足。

sentences.en: a system that provides instant access to client information
sentences.cn: 能立即查到客户信息的系统

sentences.en: an instant success
sentences.cn: 马到成功

sentences.en: At that instant the museum was plunged into total darkness.
sentences.cn: 就在那时，博物馆陷入了一片漆黑。

sentences.en: Don't expect an instant cure.
sentences.cn: 别指望立即治愈。

sentences.en: Drunkenness at work was sufficient grounds for instant dismissal.
sentences.cn: 工作时醉酒足可导致立即被开除.

sentences.en: For an instant, Barney was tempted to flee.
sentences.cn: 那一瞬间，巴尼很想逃走。

sentences.en: For an instant, Catherine was tempted to flee.
sentences.cn: 有那么一会儿，凯瑟琳很想逃跑。

sentences.en: He had taken an instant dislike to Mortlake.
sentences.cn: 他一到莫特莱克就觉得不喜欢这个地方。

sentences.en: He smiled back, which for an instant transfigured his unrevealing features.
sentences.cn: 他回笑了一下，有那么一瞬间不动声色的脸上焕发出容光。

sentences.en: He stirred instant coffee into a mug of hot water.
sentences.cn: 他将速溶咖啡搅入一大杯热水中。

sentences.en: I had bolted the door the instant I had seen the bat.
sentences.cn: 我一看到蝙蝠就把门闩上了。

sentences.en: In the same instant he flung open the car door.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，他猛地推开了车门。

sentences.en: Mr Porter'sbook was an instant hit.
sentences.cn: 波特先生的书一经推出便大受欢迎。

sentences.en: Not for an instant did I believe he had lied.
sentences.cn: 我根本就不相信他撒了谎.

sentences.en: Serve the stir-fry with "instant" noodles.
sentences.cn: 将炒菜和“方便”面一起端上桌。

sentences.en: She caught his eye for an instant.
sentences.cn: 她刹那间便吸引了他的目光。

sentences.en: She stepped towards the door and, in that very same instant, the doorbell rang.
sentences.cn: 她走向门口，就在此时门铃响了。

sentences.en: She took an instant dislike to me.
sentences.cn: 她立刻就讨厌我。

sentences.en: The engine delivers instant acceleration whatever the revs.
sentences.cn: 不论转速如何，发动机都可以立即加速。

sentences.en: The programme brought an instant response.
sentences.cn: 节目立即引起了反响。

sentences.en: The show, despite some rough edges, was an instant success.
sentences.cn: 虽然有一些瑕疵，演出还是一举获得了成功。

sentences.en: The women took an instant dislike to one another.
sentences.cn: 这些女人立刻就彼此厌恶起来。

sentences.en: When the rain started, the crowd vanished in an instant (= immediately ).
sentences.cn: 开始下雨了，人群转眼间消失无踪。

phrases.tran_cn: 方便食品；即时食品；速溶食品
